meanings.definition: To form into a globe or globes.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys globing clay into different shapes.
meanings.sent2: The artist was globing the clay to create a beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The kids were globing the playdough into tiny globes for fun.
meanings.sent4: The chef was globing the dough into perfect round shapes for the pies.
meanings.sent5: The potter was globing the clay with precision and skill.

meanings.sent1: They dream of globing to exotic destinations one day.
meanings.sent2: The explorer was globing to different countries for research.
meanings.sent3: The family was globing around the globe for their vacation.
meanings.sent4: She felt like globing through the pages of her travel journal.
meanings.sent5: Globing around the world opened up new horizons for him.
